							Hungry yet?🤤 

Drop your go-to game day snack below ↓						





							Legion has just 3 home games left this season! Come watch the #1 team in the league close out the regular season as they push for the 2023 championship! Link in bio for tickets. 

Use code: SDLEGION15 for 15% off your purchase! 🏉

#WeAreLegion #QuestForTheShield						





							4 MONTHS ⏳ 

#TheTimeIsNow						





							Our friends at San Diego Zoo Wildlife Alliance work with partners around the globe to bring species back from the brink of extinction. By supporting their conservation efforts, we’re giving polar bears, rhinos, condors and more a fighting chance in their natural habitats. 💚

Celebrate #EarthDay by being an ally for wildlife: sdzwa.org/friend #thankyouforbeingafriend 🌎						





							The full match schedule for the 2023 Gold Cup has been announced! #SnapdragonStadium is set to host a semifinal match on July 12! ⚽️

Tickets on sale Tuesday, April 25 @ 10am. Visit www.snapdragonstadium.com for more info.						





							Come support @sdlegion as they push for the championship! There are only 4 home games left, so grab your tickets now! 

🎟️ Link in bio to grab yours!						







							Things are heating up! The Red Hot Chili Peppers will take the stage at #SnapdragonStadium in just one month with very special guests The Mars Volta and Thundercat! 🌶️

🎟️ Link in bio to get your tickets NOW!						





							A moment for our premium spaces 😍						





							JUST ANNOUNCED! The @GoldCup is coming to San Diego! #SnapdragonStadium has been selected as a host venue for the 2023 Gold Cup 🏟️						





							Happy #NationalBeerDay! Our Locals Only craft beer stands feature over 40 different local craft beers on tap! Enjoy a cold one next time you’re at the stadium 🍻						





							We're officially ONE MONTH away from our first concert!! 🦜🎶
 
Did you know May 6th will be Jimmy Buffett's 30th show at SDSU!? That's more performances than any other artist in the university’s history! Check out these photos from his 1976 show at The Backdoor.
 
📸 Tom Quackenbush						





							April at #SnapdragonStadium 🔥						







							Who's excited for concert season!? 🤩 

🦜5/6 @jimmybuffett
🤘5/12: @chilipeppers 
🌆 6/2-6/4: @resetconcertseries 
🪐 9/27-9/28: @coldplay 
🌹 10/1: @gunsnroses 
🎡 10/3: @pink						





							Grab tickets NOW to watch Manchester United play Wrexham AFC this summer at Snapdragon Stadium on Tuesday, July 25.

Link in bio for tickets! 🎟️						





							JUST ANNOUNCED! Manchester United will return to the United States for the first time in five years to play the third oldest club in the world and fan favourites, Wrexham AFC at #SnapdragonStadium on July 25! 🏟️

Tickets on sale Wednesday, March 29 @ 8am PT.						





							ANOTHER 👏 RECORD 👏 SHATTERED 👏

Congrats to @sandiegowavefc for setting the new @NWSL home opener attendance record with 30,854 fans at tonight’s game!						





							Wayfinding is now available on the Snapdragon Stadium App! Locate the quickest path to your seat, nearby restrooms, your favorite concessions, and more!

Download now on the App Store or get it on Google Play 📲						





							We've got an exciting week ahead of us! Which event(s) will we see you at!? 🤩

3/23 → Aztec Football Spring Scrimmage @ 6pm
3/25 → San Diego Wave vs. Chicago Red Stars @ 7pm
3/26 → Club América vs. Xolos de Tijuana @ 2pm

Snapdragon Stadium










SNAPDRAGON STADIUM

										2101 Stadium Way     
										San Diego, CA 92108 
									


BOX OFFICE
Wednesday - Friday

10AM - 5PM









What is the bag policy? 



Snapdragon Stadium is a clear bag only venue. Guests are encouraged to limit the number of items they bring with them to the Stadium. Only (1) one of the following style and size bag, package, or container per person:

Bags that are clear plastic or clear vinyl and do not exceed 12” x 6” x 12” or a one-gallon clear plastic freezer bag.
Purses, bags, or clutches no larger than 4.5” x 6.5”.

Prohibited bags include but are not limited to large purses, coolers, briefcases, backpacks, luggage of any kind, computer bags or any bag larger than the permissible size.
Bag check lockers will be available for purchase outside the stadium on the east side.
This policy is not intended to interfere with guests attending with specific medical needs or guests caring for young children.





Where do I park?



Visit our Parking Page for more information.
